item.title: Feytech Holdings Berhad Q2 2024 Delivered Impressive Performance
item.description:
Feytech Holdings Berhad, a leading manufacturer of automotive seats and covers in Malaysia, has announced strong financial results for the second quarter ended 30 June 2024. The company’s revenue and profitability continue to be driven by the expansion of its manufacturing operations and the robust demand for its products. Here are some key highlights of Feytech’s Q2 performance.

As of Q2 2024, RM21 million of the IPO proceeds had been utilized, primarily for working capital. The remaining funds are allocated for land acquisition, construction of new facilities, purchase of machinery, and listing expenses.
